meeting_info.location: Dallas Zoo â€“ The Flamingo Room, 650 S. R.L. Thornton Fwy, Dallas TX 75203; Video Conference: https://bit.ly/4bq0ebS

agenda_items.title: Golf Course Greens Fees
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase to the specified golf course green fees at all 6 City of Dallas golf courses and the creation of a Capital Improvement Fund for golf. Estimated Revenue: $256,700.

agenda_items.title: Cypress Waters Trail - Encroachment Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a hike and bike trail encroachment agreement with Oncor for use of a portion of the Oncor easement for the construction, operation, and maintenance of the Cypress Waters Trail.

agenda_items.title: Cypress Waters Trail - Interlocal Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize an Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County for designing, constructing, and maintaining a portion of the Cypress Waters Trail.

agenda_items.title: Cypress Water Trail - Easement Acquisition
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition of three easements of approximately 885,529 square feet of land for the Cypress Waters Trail project.

agenda_items.title: Rosemeade Park - Funding Application
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the USFWS Invasive Species Eradication Funding Program in an amount of $250,000 for Rosemeade Park.

financial_items.description: Estimated Revenue from Golf Course Greens Fees
Estimated Revenue from Old City Park fee structure
